Company Overview.Name: Ceinsys Tech Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Incorporated in 1998, Ceinsys Tech Ltd provides Enterprise Geospatial & Engineering Services and sale of software and electricity. It is an ISO 9001, ISO 14001-2015, ISO 20222, and CMMI DEV Level 5 certified organization. It specializes in designing, capturing, storing, mapping, analyzing, and managing all types of geographical data. Additionally, CTL operates in niche domains like energy systems and solutions (SCADA-DMS implementation, IT rollout, automated metering infrastructure), water management services, product design, and robotics automation.
